trans-unit.source: Identifies a cell in the grid.

The DataGridCell can be used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property to get or set the value of any cell.
trans-unit.target: O DataGridCell pode ser utilizada em conjunto com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>do controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>propriedade obter ou definir o valor de qualquer célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property to a DataGridCell causes the focus to move to the cell specified by the DataGridCell.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>do controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>propriedade para um DataGridCell faz com que o foco mover para a célula especificada pelo DataGridCell.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The number of a row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de linha no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of a column in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de uma coluna no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of a column in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de uma coluna no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: You can use the ColumnNumber value to specify a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o valor de ColumnNumber para especificar um <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>no <xref:System.Data.DataTable>associados a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref> is identical to a second <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"> </xref> é idêntico para um segundo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An object you are to comparing.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que está a comparar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the second object is identical to the first; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o objeto segundo é idêntico à primeira; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash value that can be added to a <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor de hash, que pode ser adicionado a uma <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A number that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref> in a <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um número que identifica exclusivamente o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"> </xref> num <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of a row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de linha no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: You can use the RowNumber value to specify a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o valor de RowNumber para especificar um <xref:System.Data.DataRow>no <xref:System.Data.DataTable>associados a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: Gets the row number and column number of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de linha e o número de coluna da célula.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the row number and column number.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o número de linha e o número de coluna.
